metadata.title: Temporal Mastery (Temporal System Overhaul)
metadata.author: kokoro11
metadata.description:
This mod makes the Temporal System affect not only the speed of the crew in the room, but also the speed of the systems. For example, you can now use the Temporal System on weapon system to speed up or slow down weapon charging. Detailed interactions are listed below.
All ion effects can be sped up or slowed down. shields: speed up charge rates and charge energy shields when shields are fully powered / slow down charge rates engines: increase / decrease ship evasion and FTL charge rates oxygen: speed up / slow down oxygen refill rates weapons: speed up / slow down charge rates drones: increase the number of drone projectiles and increase crew drones stats / drain power medbay: unchanged pilot: increase ship evasion and provide manning bouns / decrease ship evasion sensors: provide manning bouns / drain power doors: provide manning bouns / drain power telepoter: increase crew move speed cloaking: increase evasion when cloaking is active / decrease evasion when cloaking is active artillery: speed up / slow down charge rates battery: slowly provide bonus power / drain power clonebay: unchanged mindcontrol: allow multi-person mind control / drain power hacking: allow cluster hacking
